phrs.translation: 五彩石, 上色, 彩斑, 杂色
位置效应斑驳, 位置效应花斑, 效应斑, 位置效应斑
叶杂色性, 叶色变异
颜色不均匀, 色彩斑驳

sentences.sentence: Many hollies have delightful yellow-and-white variegation.
sentences.translation: 许多冬青树长有好看的黄白相间的杂色斑。

sentences.sentence: The variegation of petals originates chiefly from gene mutation and viral infection.
sentences.translation: 花瓣彩斑主要由基因突变或病毒入侵而形成。

sentences.sentence: Recalling the world of Renaissance, it focuses on refinement, richness in detail, variegation and creating value.
sentences.translation: 回顾世界的文艺复兴运动，把重点放在完善，丰富的细节，异质性和创造价值。
